node.html:
• During my internship, I managed the DevOps pipeline, utilizing Docker for environment setup and GoCD/Jenkins for pipeline orchestration. My role focused on optimizing deployment processes and delivering ready-to-use environments for the development team.

  • This experience enhanced my skills in containerization, pipeline management, and automation scripting, reinforcing my ability to collaborate effectively in a team setting. I look forward to applying these skills in a professional environment to contribute to the success of future projects.

• In my role, I have demonstrated the ability to write modern, performant, and maintainable code for a wide range of internal projects. This includes working with diverse languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems, such as C#, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.js, ASP.NET Core MVC, REST API, AJAX, Bootstrap, and MySQL.

  • Moreover, I have effectively collaborated and communicated with multi-disciplinary teams comprising engineers, designers, and producers. This experience has honed my skills in working seamlessly across different roles and effectively coordinating efforts to achieve project goals.

  • I strive to deliver high-quality code that adheres to best practices and industry standards. I am adaptable and constantly stay updated with the latest advancements in technology, allowing me to leverage the most suitable tools and techniques for each project.

  • Overall, my experience encompasses a wide range of languages, frameworks, and collaboration with diverse teams, enabling me to contribute effectively and create successful outcomes for various projects.

• I have actively pursued learning opportunities in programming-related technologies and software, continuously expanding my knowledge in this area. This includes staying up to date with the latest programming languages, frameworks, and tools commonly used in the industry.

  • Furthermore, I have dedicated time to learning about the technology associated with computer structure and computer control. This encompasses understanding the internal components of computers, their architecture, and how they function together to execute instructions and perform tasks.

  • In addition, I have studied technologies related to computer communication and networking. This includes grasping the principles and protocols that facilitate communication between computers and other devices, such as local area networks (LANs), wide area networks (WANs), and the internet.

  • By actively engaging in learning and exploration of these areas, I have acquired a comprehensive understanding of programming technologies, computer structures, and communication technologies. This knowledge allows me to tackle a wide range of technical challenges and contribute effectively to projects in the field.

• I have studied various aspects of information technology, including foundational concepts in computer programming, database systems, and basic computer networking. Additionally, I have delved into business programming, data communication, and networking systems analysis and design.

  • Furthermore, I have experience in developing technical workflow systems, management information systems, and operating systems for management purposes. I have also participated in seminars addressing business computer problems and have been involved in business computer projects.

  • These experiences have provided me with a comprehensive understanding of both technical and managerial aspects of computer systems. I am equipped with the skills necessary to analyze, design, and develop efficient and effective solutions for business-related challenges.
